General.Name: DELPHI WORLD MONEY LIMITED
General.Description: Delphi World Money Limited engages in the money changing and money transfer businesses in India. The company offers foreign exchange, outward and inward remittance, and travel insurance services, as well as prepaid and gift cards for corporate and retail clients. It operates through a network of 18 branches. The company was formerly known as Ebixcash World Money India Limited and changed its name to Delphi World Money Limited in August 2021. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Mumbai, India. Delphi World Money Limited operates as a subsidiary of EbixCash World Money Limited.

1.Name: Mr. Hariprasad Meenoth Panichikkil
1.Title: Head of National Sales & Additional Director
